title: Marjorie Taylor Greene
deleted: In September 2020, Greene tweeted her intention to give away an [[AR-15 style rifle]] that she used in one of her campaign advertisements.<ref name="iqTTY">{{cite news|last=Moreno|first=J. Edward|date=September 4, 2020|title=GOP candidate Marjorie Taylor Greene posts image of herself with gun next to members of 'Squad'|url=https://thehill.com/homenews/house/515149-republican-congressional-candidate-marjorie-taylor-greene-post-of-image-of|access-date=November 28, 2020|work=The Hill|archive-date=November 17, 2020|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20201117015855/https://thehill.com/homenews/house/515149-republican-congressional-candidate-marjorie-taylor-greene-post-of-image-of|url-status=live}}</ref>

In September 2021, Greene announced another gun giveaway, this time of a [[Barrett M82|Barrett M82A1]] [[anti-materiel rifle]]. To advertise the giveaway, Greene posted a video of herself shooting a [[Toyota Prius]] with the label "socialism"; the Prius then exploded, and Greene said she would “blow away the Democrats’ socialist agenda."<ref>{{Cite web|last=Solender|first=Andrew|date=16 September 2021|title=Marjorie Taylor Greene Raffles Off .50 Caliber Sniper Rifle In Latest Stunt|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andrewsolender/2021/09/16/marjorie-taylor-greene-raffles-off-50-caliber-sniper-rifle-in-latest-stunt/|url-status=live|access-date=2021-09-19|website=Forbes|language=en}}</ref>
